com.pkrete.xrd4j.common.message

Class AbstractMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pkrete.xrd4j.common.message.AbstractMessage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ServiceRequest, ServiceResponse

    public abstract class AbstractMessage
extends Object
    This class represents SOAP header fields that are used in both ServiceRequest and ServiceResponse messages.
    Author:
    Petteri Kivim√§ki

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ConsumerMember consumer
      ConsumerMember that calls a service and acts as a client.
      protected ErrorMessage errorMessage
      Possible ErrorMessage related to this message.
      protected String id
      Unique identifier for this message.
      protected String issue
      Identifies received application, issue or document that was the cause of the service request.
      protected ProducerMember producer
      ServiceProvider whose service is being called by the consumer.
      protected SOAPMessage soapMessage
      SOAPMessage object representing this message.
      protected String userId
      User whose action initiated the request.

    • Field Detail

      • consumer

        protected ConsumerMember consumer
        ConsumerMember that calls a service and acts as a client. Requried.

      • producer

        protected ProducerMember producer
        ServiceProvider whose service is being called by the consumer. Required.

      • id

        protected String id
        Unique identifier for this message. Required.

      • userId

        protected String userId
        User whose action initiated the request. Optional.

      • issue

        protected String issue
        Identifies received application, issue or document that was the cause of the service request. Optional.

      • soapMessage

        protected SOAPMessage soapMessage
        SOAPMessage object representing this message. Required.

      • errorMessage

        protected ErrorMessage errorMessage
        Possible ErrorMessage related to this message. Value is null, if there's no error.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractMessage

        protected AbstractMessage()
        Constructs and initializes a new AbstractMessage object.

      • AbstractMessage

        protected AbstractMessage(ConsumerMember consumer,
               ProducerMember producer,
               String id)
                   throws XRd4JException
        Constructs and initializes a new AbstractMessage object.
        Parameters:
        consumer - client that's calling a service
        producer - service provider whose service the client is calling
        id - unique identifier of the message
        Throws:
        XRd4JException - if there's a XRd4J error

    • Method Detail

      • getConsumer

        public ConsumerMember getConsumer()
        Returns the consumer that's calling a service and acting a client.
        Returns:
        ConsumerMember that's acting as a client

      • setConsumer

        public void setConsumer(ConsumerMember consumer)
        Changes the value of the consumer that's calling a service and acting a client.
        Parameters:
        consumer - new value

      • getProducer

        public ProducerMember getProducer()
        Returns the ServiceProvider whose service is being called by the consumer.
        Returns:
        ProducerMember that's producing the service that's being called

      • setProducer

        public void setProducer(ProducerMember producer)
        Changes the value of the producer whose service is being called by the consumer.
        Parameters:
        producer - new value

      • getId

        public String getId()
        Returns the unique identifier of the message. The value is set by the ServiceConsumer.
        Returns:
        unique identifier of the message.

      • setId

        public void setId(String id)
        Sets the unique identifier of the message. The identifier must be set by the ServiceConsumer and the ServiceProducer must not change the value.
        Parameters:
        id - new universally unique identifier value

      • getUserId

        public String getUserId()
        Returns the id of the user whose action initiated the request. The value is set by the ServiceConsumer.
        Returns:
        id of the user whose action initiated the request

      • setUserId

        public void setUserId(String userId)
        Sets the id of the user whose action initiated the request. The value must be set by the ServiceConsumer and must not be changed by the ServiceProvider.
        Parameters:
        userId - new value

      • getIssue

        public String getIssue()
        Returns the issue that was the cause of the service request.
        Returns:
        issue that was the cause of the service request

      • setIssue

        public void setIssue(String issue)
        Sets the issue that was the cause of the service request.
        Parameters:
        issue - new value

      • getSoapMessage

        public SOAPMessage getSoapMessage()
        Returns the SOAPMessage object related to this message. The SOAPMessage object is always automatically set by request/response serializers and deserializers.
        Returns:
        SOAPMessage object related to this message

      • setSoapMessage

        public void setSoapMessage(SOAPMessage soapMessage)
        Sets the SOAPMessage object related to this message. The SOAPMessage object is always automatically set by request/response serializers and deserializers and must never be set manually.
        Parameters:
        soapMessage - new value

      • getErrorMessage

        public ErrorMessage getErrorMessage()
        Returns the ErrorMessage related to this message. Value is null, if there's no error.
        Returns:
        ErrorMessage related to this message or null

      • setErrorMessage

        public void setErrorMessage(ErrorMessage errorMessage)
        Sets the ErrorMessage related to this message.
        Parameters:
        errorMessage - new value

      • hasError

        public boolean hasError()
        Tells if there's an error related to this message. Returns true if and only if there's an error. Otherwise returns false.
        Returns:
        true if and only if there's an error; otherwise false

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
